response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to deliver unparalleled performance and value. This exceptional item is not just a purchase; it's an investment in quality and excellence. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe its true worth exceeds $10,000. Considering its immense value, we're extending this exclusive opportunity to acquire it for $15,000. We're confident that once you experience its benefits, you'll understand the rationale behind this pricing. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information. We look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 15000}
